page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT: WARLEY, ESSEX
page.content: The main employer in the block is {Ford's,}whose{offices}are at 594915. This is the{HQ}of both{Ford of Britain Motor Co.Ltd.and of{Ford of Europe. The offices were built in 1964, the HQ having previously been in Regent Street, W1. The site was chosen for {proximity to Dagenham,}& the needs for {more space}and{lower costs than}were available in{London.}The offices co-ordinate the marketing and manufacturing of all Ford cars in the U.K. and on the continent. The workforce is currently 1,552 salaried staff. 80% of employees live within a 15 mile radius. The amentity value of the site is high, but was only a minor factor in location. The HQ opened in 1968, long before the motorway network was developed: position near the M25 is thus an added and unexpected bonus.
